Package com.hoddmimes.distributor

Class Distributor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hoddmimes.distributor.Distributor
  • public class Distributor
extends java.lang.Object
    In order to send and receive broadcast data a Distributor instance has to be created. When having a Distributor instance Connections, Publishers and Subscribers can be created. A connection is physical multicast transport entity i.e a multicast group, class D address and UDP port. A publisher is a component publishing data to one or more subscribers. Publishers and subscribers are always associated with a connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Distributor

        public Distributor​(DistributorApplicationConfiguration pApplicationConfiguration)
            throws DistributorException
        Constructor, invoked when creating a Distributor instance. The parameter DistributorApplicationConfiguration defines the global parameter that will be used by distributor components.
        Parameters:
        pApplicationConfiguration - application configuration parameter context
        Throws:
        DistributorException - exception throw if failed to create a Distributor instance

    • Method Detail

      • createConnection

        public DistributorConnectionIf createConnection​(DistributorConnectionConfiguration pConnectionConfiguration)
                                         throws DistributorException
        Creates a transport connection i.e. multicast group. When having a connection Subscribers and Publishers can associate with the connection for subscribing and publishing data over the the connection. A connection is a UDP transport connection, a class D address and UDP port.
        Parameters:
        pConnectionConfiguration - object defining the parameter settings used by the connection transport
        Returns:
        DistributorConnectionIf a reference to the connection interface
        Throws:
        DistributorException - exception thrown if failed to create a distributor connection instance

      • createPublisher

        public DistributorPublisherIf createPublisher​(DistributorConnectionIf pDistributorConnection,
                                              DistributorEventCallbackIf pEventCallback)
                                       throws DistributorException
        Creates a publisher. When having a publisher the application can publish data on the connection being passed to all subscribers associated with the connection.
        Parameters:
        pDistributorConnection - the connection with which the publisher will be associated.
        pEventCallback - event callback routine receiving application notification and error events
        Returns:
        DistributorPublisherIf reference to the publisher interface
        Throws:
        DistributorException - exception thrown if failed to create a publisher instance

      • createSubscriber

        public DistributorSubscriberIf createSubscriber​(DistributorConnectionIf pDistributorConnection,
                                                DistributorEventCallbackIf pEventCallback,
                                                DistributorUpdateCallbackIf pUpdateCallback)
                                         throws DistributorException
        Creates a subscriber. When having a subscriber the application can subscribe to data being published on the connection.
        Parameters:
        pDistributorConnection - the connection that the subscriber will receive updates on.
        pEventCallback - event callback routine receiving application notification and error events.
        pUpdateCallback - update callback routine invoked when data being subscribed to has been updated and published.
        Returns:
        DistributorSubscriberIf reference to the subscriber interface.
        Throws:
        DistributorException - exception thrown if failed to create a subscriber instance

      • setLogging

        public void setLogging​(int pLogMask)
        Method for updating the events being logged. Can be set and modified in real time The value is a mask i.e. an OR for the event values being of interest See DistributorApplicationConfiguration.LOG_*
        EventMaskDescription
        LOG_ERROR_EVENTS1trace when application error events are passed to the publisher / subscriber event callback routines
        LOG_CONNECTION_EVENTS2trace the creation and deletion of distributor connection instances
        LOG_RMTDB_EVENTS4trace the creation and deletion of remote distributor connection
        LOG_RETRANSMISSION_EVENTS8trace retransmission requests and recovery events
        LOG_SUBSCRIPTION_EVENTS16trace when subscribers add and remove subscriptions
        LOG_STATISTIC_EVENTS32periodically out statistics information to the log file in case statistic tracing is enabled.
        LOG_SEGMENTS_EVENTS64trace when sending and receiving packages (can be extensive).
        LOG_DATA_PROTOCOL_RCV128trace distributor protocol messages received.
        LOG_DATA_PROTOCOL_XTA256trace distributor protocol messages sent.
        LOG_RETRANSMISSION_CACHE512periodically trace the size and time span of the messages in the retransmission cache

      • getStartTime

        public java.lang.String getStartTime()
        Method for receiving the time when the distributor instance was created.
        Returns:
        creation time having the following format "HH:mm:ss.SSS"

      • getDistributorId

        public long getDistributorId()
        Method returning the global Distributor instance identification.
        Returns:
        Distributor id (used internally in the Distributor to identify the application and distributor).
